name: Ring Protocol
description: Ring Protocol is a comprehensive set of financial products designed to redefine the DeFi landscape. Its flagship products are Ring Exchange and RingX Aggregator. Ring Exchange now stands as one of the largest protocols on Blast, with $300M+ TVL. RingX Aggregator integrates and optimize resources from multiple decentralized exchanges on Blast, providing users with a more efficient, cost-effective, and convenient trading experience.
